io.discloader.discloader.entity

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.discloader.discloader.entity.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a message object on the api
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Perry Berman

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public final java.lang.String id
        The message's Snowflake ID.

      • content

        public java.lang.String content
        The message's content

      • edited_timestamp

        public java.lang.String edited_timestamp
        The time at which the message has been edited. is null if the message has not been edited

      • nonce

        public java.lang.String nonce
        Used for checking if the message has been sent

      • webhookID

        public java.lang.String webhookID
        The id of the webhook that sent the message. null if sent by a bot/user account

      • tts

        public boolean tts
        Whether or not the message was sent using /tts

      • editable

        public boolean editable
        Whether or not you can edit the message.
        will always be true when author.id == this.loader.user.id

      • pinned

        public boolean pinned
        Is the messaged pinned in the channel

      • timestamp

        public final java.util.Date timestamp
        The time at which the message was sent

      • editedAt

        public java.util.Date editedAt

      • mentions

        public Mentions mentions
        An object containing the information about who was mentioned in the message

      • loader

        public final DiscLoader loader
        The current instance of DiscLoader

      • channel

        public final ITextChannel channel
        The channel the message was sent in

      • author

        public final User author
        The user who authored the message

      • guild

        public Guild guild
        The guild the channel is in. is null if Channel.type is "dm" or "groupDM"

      • member

        public GuildMember member
        The member who sent the message if applicable

      • delete

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Message> delete()
        Deletes the message if the loader has suficient permissions
        Returns:
        A Future that completes with this when sucessfull
        See Also:
        Constants.PermissionFlags

      • edit

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Message> edit(RichEmbed embed)
        Edit's the messages content. Only possible if the loader is the message's author
        Parameters:
        embed - The new embed for the message
        Returns:
        A Future that completes with this when sucessfull

      • edit

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Message> edit(java.lang.String content)
        Edit's the messages content. Only possible if the loader is the message's author
        Parameters:
        content - The new content of the message
        Returns:
        A Future that completes with this when sucessfull

                                                            RichEmbed embed)

        Parameters:
        content - The new content of the message
        embed - The new embed for the message
